member.name: M:FUEL_DISPATCH_API.Controllers.VehicleModelController.PostModel(FUEL_DISPATCH_API.DataAccess.Models.Model)
member.summary: Posts a new vehicle model to the system.
member.param: The model object to be added. This object should be provided in the request body.
member.returns: An ActionResult object containing a ResultPattern of Make type. If the model is successfully added, the ResultPattern will contain the created model data. If an error occurs during the process, the ResultPattern will contain an error message. The HTTP status code for this request is set to 201 Created.
